title: 2010–11 Hamilton Academical F.C. season
text:
The 2010–11 season was the 124th season of competitive <a href="Association%20football">football</a> by <a href="Hamilton%20Academical%20F.C.">Hamilton Academical</a> and the third back in the <a href="Football%20in%20Scotland">top-flight</a> of Scottish football. Hamilton Academical competed in the <a href="2010%E2%80%9311%20Scottish%20Premier%20League">Scottish Premier League</a>, <a href="2010%E2%80%9311%20Scottish%20Cup">Scottish Cup</a> and <a href="2010%E2%80%9311%20Scottish%20League%20Cup">Scottish League Cup</a>.
Overview.
Hamilton had a disappointing season seeing them relegated from the <a href="2010%E2%80%9311%20Scottish%20Premier%20League">Scottish Premier League</a> finishing in 12th place. They managed only 6 wins in all competitions out of the 42 fixtures played.
